item.title: Avalanche: Web Design Kerry | Websites Cork & Dublin
item.description: At Avalanche we do web design in Kerry, Cork, Limerick, Dublin & Ireland. We build amazing websites & eCommerce solutions for our clients worldwide.

item.title: The Benefits of Using a Website Dev versus Doing It In-House
item.description: Creating a website is a critical step for businesses and individuals looking to establish an online presence and engage with their target audience.

item.title: Peninsula Sports | GAA Equipment & Gifts
item.description: Peninsula Sports supply all types of GAA equipment including handmade hurls, slitoars, footballs, socks, helmets, gaelic gloves, personalised club/school gloves, hurling gloves, training aids, gifts and more. They also supply team wear, work wear and also provide an in house print & embroidery service.

item.title: Digital Forge | Fibre Broadband | Web Design Cork
item.description: Digital Forge is a dynamic company with many years of experience. Founded in 2004 to address the lack of high-speed internet, they have grown through Cork.

item.title: Elite Talent Hub | Recruitment | Web Design Limerick
item.description: Founded in Limerick, Elite Talent Hub has rapidly established itself as a unique provider of recruitment services throughout the Republic of Ireland.

item.description: The National Wind Turbine Maintenance Technician Apprenticeship is for people who wish to pursue a career in the maintenanceof large scale commercial wind turbines.

item.title: Phonesavers | The phones you can trust | Web Design Killarney
item.description: Phonesavers has been established over 15 years in the phone business. They specialise in iPhones, Androids, Tablets, Phone Accessories, Device Repair & Phone Unlocking.

item.title: O' Sullivan's Agri Store | Beaufort, Kerry
item.description: The “Shop” at Beaufort Bridge was first established by Jack Scully in 1955. Michael and Joan O'Sullivan bought the premises in 1986, and together they grew the business into what it is today.

item.title: ProActiv Physiotherapy | Fitness & Health
item.description: ProActiv Physiotherapy based in Killarney was established by Kieran O' Shea. The have a holistic approach to fitness & health that yields consistent results for their clients.

item.description: Intellicom develop, sell and support advanced telephony and multi-channel contact centre solutions, all offering rich unified communications capabilities, wide ranging 3rd party systems integration and highly reliable voice trunks with low cost call tariffs to any destination World Wide.

item.title: Grogan Linemark | High Performance Line Markings
item.description: Grogan Linemark Ltd was formed by Stephen Grogan to provide high performance line marking solutions. With over 20 years industry experience, they always deliver the highest standards in line marking & customer service.

item.title: Ring of Kerry Quality Lamb | For all your Lamb needs | eCommerce Website
item.description: Ring of Kerry Quality Lamb are a group of over 20 sheep farmers who live around the Ring of Kerry. Motivated by a common commitment to quality and a drive to keep their enterprise sustainable, they decided in Spring 2009 to come together as a group and market their lamb directly.

item.title: Hilt Career & Employment Services | Career Consulting
item.description: Hilt works with individuals and organisations to help you navigate your way through the career planning and employment maze.

item.title: DCC Forum | Dynamic Currency Conversion
item.description: The DCC Forum is an internationally representative industry body that advocates for the best practice of Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC). Led by 5 industry experts, the DCC Forum aims to educate consumers.

item.title: Flags 2U | Flags & Bunting For All Occasions
item.description: Flags 2u is an Irish Company that’s based in Cork that has many years' experience in the selling and installation of wall mounted aluminium and ground mounted fibreglass flagpoles, to pubs, restaurants, hotels, schools and other businesses nationwide.

item.title: Longford Self Storage | Safe Storage Location in Ireland.
item.description: Longford Self Storage offers affordable storage services for businesses & personal use. Safe, secure, & easy to access, they cover all your storage needs.

item.title: Irish Micro Business Awards | Celebrating Ireland's Business Community
item.description: The Irish Micro Business Awards celebrate the leaders of Ireland's small business community. Their mission is to honour & recognise Ireland’s small businesses as well as those champions & advocates that support them.

item.title: Datum Building and Civil Engineering
item.description: The core values of Datum Building and Civil Engineering are Safety, Quality, Productivity, Programme and Housekeeping. Their core values are the way through which they operate, and they form the basis of everything they do at Datum.

item.description: ACL Safety Training instructors are professionals in their field, qualified and accredited to the highest standards and dedicated to providing an exceptional service to their clients.

item.description: Happy Sunday evening! I just had a great weekend at the MBAâ€™s in Waterford as I was lucky enough to be named Best Young Business Person. It was a fantastic honour to receive such a wonderful award.

item.title: 25, 'maturing' & still a cry-baby
item.description: It is with great trepidation I sit down to write an article that is intensely personal & some things within this article have only ever been told to a handful of people. As someone who has seen articles rehashed & transfigured based on reader impressions then spat back as something else entirely I am acutely wary of the threat lazy journalism provides.

item.title: Christmas 2022 | Merry Christmas from Avalanche
item.description: It's that time of year again! The Christmas season is upon us, and we here at Avalanche wanted to take a moment to say thank you to our wonderful customers & clients from all over the world.

item.title: Ballyduff Central National School Tablet Donation | Avalanche
item.description: We decided to buy a Samsung Galaxy Tablet for every student (15) in the class instead. With learning/schooling moving online, not every student is fully equipped for this so hopefully, this donation will be able to help those who need it the most.

item.title: The Last Of Us: Part II | Game Review | Avalanche
item.description: The Last of Us: Part II is an emotional journey that will captivate both newcomers and those of us who have been waiting the best part of a decade for a sequel.

item.title: Are Millennials the worst generation? | Blog | Avalanche
item.description: Millennials are the generation that laugh at our parents for not being able to change their social media settings but must Google how long it takes to boil an egg. We are arrogant, lazy, entitled and because we all got participation trophies, we all think we are special. We're not and herein lies the problem.

item.title: The GrÃ¡ for Bailedubh GAA | Avalanche Sponsorship
item.description: As mentioned, I am happy to be from Kerry but more than that, I am deeply proud of the fact that I am a Ballyduff man. I was first given the green jersey at the age of 8 and I havenâ€™t let go of it since. It is why I am so proud to be able to give back to my GAA club in some small capacity by sponsoring events.
